name: Alone Against Fear Bundle
description:
This discounted bundle includes:

Alone Against Fear - the core game and campaign. You create a character with a point buy and random equipment, and move through a monster-infected town attempting to close the Seven Gates of Hell

Village of the Living Dolls - an adventure in an isolated village where SOMETHING is turning the villagers into dolls. For lovers of creepy things.

The Coming of the Dark Templars -- an adventure where you have to fight blind, undead templars returning from their graves to kill the people who put them to death. It comes with a large printable poster of the map used in the adventure.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Not interested in the bundle because you already have the core game? You can buy individual PDFs on ganeshagames.net
